Source, new CacheDependency(Server.MapPath("authors.xml"))); // we created the data explicitly, so advertise that fact CacheMsg.Text = "Dataset created explicitly"; } else { CacheMsg.Text = "Dataset retrieved from cache"; } MyDataGrid.DataSource = Source; MyDataGrid.DataBind(); } </script> <body> <form runat="server"> <h3><font face="Verdana">File Dependencies</font></h3> <ASP:DataGrid
